biotools.summary: Recovering Historical Signal from Heterotachously-evolved Sequence Alignments | Molecular sequence data that have evolved under the influence of heterotachous evolutionary processes are known to mislead phylogenetic inference. We introduce the General Heterogeneous evolution On a Single Topology (GHOST) model of sequence evolution, implemented under a maximum-likelihood framework in the phylogenetic program IQ-TREE (http: www.iqtree.org).

bioschemas.name: iq-GHOST
